title: MFM Minisode 31
description: It's a new My Favorite Murder minisode where Karen and Georgia read stories sent in by listeners like you! This week's hometowns include: a story of survival, a light-hearted SWAT team takeover, an encounter with a creepy tree man, and more!
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
